ing: 1/4 cup hot water, more if needed
des: "Always a favorite, this peanut sauce is light and easy to prepare and great for dipping spring rolls or chicken. It can be kept in the fridge for a few days."
ins: Whisk the peanut butter, lime juice, garlic, hot sauce, coconut milk, soy sauce, and hot water together in a large mixing bowl until smooth, adding hot water as needed.
